name: Jaz and Juni and the Knife That Killed Time and Space
name_original: Jaz and Juni and the Knife That Killed Time and Space
description:
Jaz and Juni and the Knife That Killed Time and Space is a really weird, very short Twine story about lesbians, whittling, feeling crushed by work, irresponsible use of knives, and holograms.

It features 3 endings and a complete soundtrack. Warning: Contains a tense scene involving a knife, but no actual violence.

Download the OST from Bandcamp here.
